pullrequest.title: README: Clarify that the parser is named libsdformat, while the specification is named SDF

content.raw:
Perhaps this distinction would be better placed in a tiny bulleted list? e.g.

* SDFormat - The specification.

    * SDF - Synonym for SDFormat. However, SDFormat should be preferred, as “SDF” sometimes stands for “Signed Distance Field” in robotics.
    
* `libsdformat` - The C\+\+ parsing code
content.html:
Perhaps this distinction would be better placed in a tiny bulleted list? e.g.

  • SDFormat - The specification.

    • SDF - Synonym for SDFormat. However, SDFormat should be preferred, as “SDF” sometimes stands for “Signed Distance Field” in robotics.

  • libsdformat - The C++ parsing code
